data.name: Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer Credit Card
data.description: Go places faster with our award-winning Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer credit card. Turn your everyday spend into flights, accomodation and more. The sky's the limit.

features.additionalInfo: For purchases of up to $100, simply wave & go anywhere that has a Visa payWave sensor, making payments easy and convenient.

Rest assured that we're on the case, to keep your card safe around the clock with Fraudshield. As long as you keep your contact details up to date, we'll contact you if we detect any irregular transactions on your account. Our cards also come with Visa's Zero Liability policy, ensuring you won't be held liable for fraudulent transactions made with your card.

Take advantage of round-the-clock access to the Visa Platinum Concierge Service. It's the next best thing to having your very own personal assistant and all it takes is a phone call or a mouse click, anytime, anywhere in the world.
Turn your everyday credit card spend into flights, accommodation and more.

If you purchase the entire cost of covered products using your Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer or High Flyer Card, the scheme guarantees the cardholder gets the best price if, within 60 days of the purchase, they advise us that they have, subsequent to their purchase, received a catalogue showing the same covered products for a lower price from a store within 25 kilometers of the store from where the covered product was purchased, and the price difference is greater than AU$75, we will refund the price difference up to $500. It does not apply to any purchases over the internet, as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions.

Reward yourself with a lower rate. Apply for an instalment plan that lets you pay off your card balance with certainty and allows you the potential to save on monthly interest that you may otherwise pay. Plus you can still enjoy interest free days on your other purchases made outside the Fixed Payment Option.

This cover provides certain benefits in the event of accidental death and cover for cardholders who sustain an injury whilst on a trip, while riding as a passenger in or boarding or alighting transport while overseas, where the entire trip has been purchased on your Virgin Australia Velocity Flyer or High Flyer Card, as outlined in the Complimentary Insurance Terms and Conditions.
Enjoy an exclusive $129 Virgin Australia Gift Voucher each year. To unlock your benefit, simply make a retail purchase in the 2 months prior to requesting your voucher.

Imagine having first choice of seats to some of the most sought-after events in Australia. No queuing, no waiting, no disappointment to some of the biggest concerts, hottest shows and most exciting sports events, before pre-sales and before they go on sale to the general public.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be at least 18 years of age to apply for a credit card

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee per statement period when your credit limit is exceeded

fees.name: International Cash Advance
fees.additionalInfo: International cash withdrawls on your credit card

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for each time a cheque or Direct Debit payment is dishonoured.

fees.name: Annual fee
fees.additionalInfo: Annual fee charged on the card.

fees.name: Late Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for each time we do not receive the Minimum Payment Due and any Overdue Amount by the payment due date, debited to your Account after the payment due date.

fees.name: Domestic Cash Advance below $100
fees.additionalInfo: Domestic cash withdrawals from your credit card.

fees.name: Domestic Cash Advance above $100
fees.additionalInfo: Domestic cash withdrawals from your credit card.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each statement period we issue you with a paper statement, $2 will be debited to your account in the following statement period. This may be waived in limited circumstances

fees.name: Additional card fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for an additional card holder.

fees.name: International Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For retail purchases or cash advance transactions made in a foreign currency or using a foreign merchant

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Up to 55 days Interest free  on retail purchases (unless you have a balance transfer)
